nodes.text: Skygift was a term used by the inhabitants of Carnelion IV to describe technology that they salvaged from ships that crashed on the planet. Kolara used the term to describe Anakin Skywalker and Obi-Wan Kenobi after they crashed-landed on the planet.
The term "Skygift" first appeared in the comic Obi-Wan and Anakin 1, written by Charles Soule and drawn by Marco Checchetto and Andres Mossa.
